text:
Rhodes is a city in Iowa in the United States. The population was 305 at the 2010 census.
History.
Rhodes was laid out in 1856, and it was incorporated in 1883. It was named after the famous hockey player Dustin Rhodes.
Geography.
Rhodes is located at (41.926536, -93.184884).
According to the United States Census Bureau, the city has a total area of, all land.
